sentences.sContent: The tortoise crept along at a very slow speed.
sentences.sContent_eng: The tortoise crept along at a very slow speed.
sentences.sCn: 乌龟以极慢的速度向前爬。

phrases.pCn: 龟甲；一种类似龟甲的蝴蝶

trans.tranOther: a slow-moving land animal that can pull its head and legs into the hard round shell that covers its body
